@graph.caption: Energy Bites with Coconut and Cherries

@graph.name: Energy Bites with Coconut and Cherries - Vegan Heaven
@graph.description: These energy bites with coconut and cherries make such a great snack! They're super easy to make and perfect when you're craving something sweet & healthy!

@graph.headline: Energy Bites with Coconut and Cherries
@graph.keywords: energy balls recipe,energy bites recipe,energy bites with chia seeds,energy bites with coconut,energy bites with oats,energy bites without nut butter,how long will energy balls last,how long will energy bites last,how to make energy bites,how to store energy balls,how to store energy bites,raw vegan energy balls,what are energy balls,what are energy bites

@graph.name: Energy Bites with Coconut and Cherries
@graph.description: These energy bites with coconut and cherries make such a great snack! They're super easy to make and perfect when you're craving something sweet but want to eat healthy!
recipeIngredient: more coconut flakes, to roll in

recipeInstructions.text: Put all ingredients into a high speed blender or food processor and pulse until all ingredients are well combined. Usually you have to pulse about 6-8 times. You should get a very sticky mixture, which can easily be formed into little balls.
recipeInstructions.name: Put all ingredients into a high speed blender or food processor and pulse until all ingredients are well combined. Usually you have to pulse about 6-8 times. You should get a very sticky mixture, which can easily be formed into little balls.

recipeInstructions.text: Form the mixture into 18-20 energy balls. Put some coconut flakes on a plate and roll the energy bites in them. The energy balls can be stored in an air-tight container in the fridge for up to one week. Enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Form the mixture into 18-20 energy balls. Put some coconut flakes on a plate and roll the energy bites in them. The energy balls can be stored in an air-tight container in the fridge for up to one week. Enjoy!
